translations: n．低俗之人，庸俗之人：对高雅艺术、文化和知识表现出冷漠或不理解的人。
· The movie was a hit among lowbrows.
这部电影在庸俗之人中非常受欢迎。

sentences.sentence: Cross talk has been a national art popular among both highbrows and lowbrows with the efforts of performers generation after generation.
sentences.translation: 相声在一代又一代表演者的努力下，一直是深受知识分子和平民喜爱的国民艺术。
